front.title: Adding a SWAP Operation to NFSv4.2

abstract.t: The Network File System version 4.2 (NFSv4.2) allows for the atomic update of data in a single WRITE operation. It does not allow for an atomic update of multiple WRITE operations. This document introduces a new SWAP operation which allows for such atomic updates. This document extends NFSv4.2 (see RFC7862).
